# lima_disk (Resource)

Lima disk resource. Creates and manages a disk using limactl disk create.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "lima_disk" "ml_models" {
  name = "models"
  size = 50
}

resource "lima_instance" "docker" {
  name     = "docker"
  template = "docker"

  mount_none = true

  disks {
    name        = lima_disk.ml_models.name
    mount_point = "/mnt/models"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the disk.
- `size` (Number) Size of the disk in GiB. Can be increased (but not decreased) after creation.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Disk identifier (same as name).

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import lima_disk.example my-existing-disk
```
